nodes.text: VargeCorp were a company that produced ClimbAll Armor, a form of armor attachment consisting of integrated ascension gear. The product was available during the Galactic Civil War.

VargeCorp was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 Star Wars Roleplaying supplement Special Modifications, which was published by Fantasy Flight Games. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Han Solo and the Corporate Sector Sourcebook, a 1993 roleplaying supplement written by Michael Allen Horne for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
